column1: The first question of law on which leave to appeal has been granted is as

Can  a  party 
to  a  partition  action  who  has  been  brought
substitute  a  deceased  original  defendant,  who  has

column2: neglected  to  file  a  statement  of  claim  or  even  a  proxy  despite
notice/summons  being  served  on  such  defendant,  be  permitted  to
file fresh pleadings nearly 24 years after the institution of the action
when the said action has reached the stage envisaged in section 184
